name: SAURASHTRA NAGRIK SUVIDHA SEVA SAMAJ TRUST
briefDescription: OUR MAIN OBJECT IS TO PROVIDE TRAINING AND EMPLOYMENT TO POOR PEOPLE, SPECIALLY TO WOMEN. SINCE TRUST INCORPORATE, WE PROVIDED SCHOOLING TO CHILDRENS OF POOR PEOPLE, PROGRAMME INTRODUCED "BALWADI", AND ALSO PAST CONTRACTOR OF "MADHYAHAN BHOJAN PROJECT" INITIATED BY GUJARAT GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE GOOD FOOD TO CHILDRENS OF "AANGANWADI".
